attributes.action: recognise effect of charging extra for more than a refuse NORMAL load.increased fly tipping.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: in Kerry Ireland,fly tipping is rife,and so are Rats.Walke in the countryside,but wear boots and carry a stick.Every pile of rubbish is home for brazen Rats. This is the result of charge per bag.However in this pay more get less culture we expect the worse.

reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
